title: Morgana skin
body:
I have noticed that with Blackthorn Morgana, there are times that she will freeze in place as if it was lag and then jump forward however much time has passed. Which landed me dead in most team fights. There were also times that it would not let her go past the inhibitors and sent her back to nexus turret over and over.... 

This can last from a second or two up to a full minute.

replies.body:
Hey KrisBerry89 - 

Thanks for the report! I looked into the issue, and I'm not able to repro this issue. Are you experiencing this every time? Is this something that occurs under specific circumstances/skills used?

I had gotten a skin boost while playing an aram and that was the skin I got. I don't own it. But I had noticed other morgs over the day with the same skin having very similar issues. I had also seen it on Summoners Rift with the same skin. I haven't had or seen any other issues with morg cept with this particular skin.

This is the game that I had noticed first hand that it was happening

http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2133010070/48109551?tab=overview

This was one that I had noticed another player having the same issue also on aram. But they said it was also happening on SR
http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2132968817/48109551?tab=overview
Hmm. Okay. Thanks for the additional info. I'll talk to the team and see if they have any idea as to why it's happening.
